sub_title: Professor Emeritus, Education and Competence Studies
summary:
Education. Educational research. Vocational education. Professional education. Higher Education. Teacher education. Continuing professional development. Training. Human Resource Management and Development. International development cooperation. Management. Competence. Competency. Competencies. Competence development. Competence-based education. Editing. Publishing. Reviewing. Consulting.

awards.title: Award in Recognition of Exceptional Service
awards.description: This award was given for my role as chair of the conference Competence and Excellence in Extension and Education.

awards.title: Honorary Fellowship
awards.description: This fellowship was awarded by the Vocational Education and Training Research Network (VETNET) community because of the work I did as founder of the network.
awards.issuer: Vocational Education and Training Research Network of the European Educational Research Association

awards.title: Outstanding Paper Award
awards.description: This Award was given for the following publication: Mulder, M., T. Lans, J. Verstegen, H.J.A. Biemans & Y. Meijer (2007). Competence development of entrepreneurs in innovative horticulture. Journal of Workplace Learning, (19)1, 32-44.

awards.title: Outstanding Service Award
awards.description: This award was given for my keynote at the conference organised by the Asia-Pacific Educators Association for Agriculture and Environment.
awards.issuer: Asia-Pacific Educators Association for Agriculture and Environment

awards.title: Honorary Scientist
awards.description: This Award was given for my expertise in competence-based agricultural education and extension.
awards.issuer: Rural Development Agency, Seoul, Republic of Korea

awards.title: Opleidingsonderscheiding
awards.description: This Award was given to acknowledge excellence in the field of training and development and bridging the world of research and practice.

organizations.name: American Educational Research Association
organizations.position: past chair of SIG Workplace learning

projects.title: mmulder.nl
projects.description: The creation of my website was not meant as a project. It was meant as a service to students and professionals in developing societies who did not have access to my papers. So I created a rudimentary website on which I uploaded papers and later pictures and PPTs, etc. Since numbers of hits and visits went up year by year, this activity grew out as being a personal project. I try to keep the site current which is sometimes challenging next to the other things I am doing. The year 2015 will probably end with over 900.000 hits.

profile_positions.company: MM Consultancy for Education and Training
profile_positions.title: Director Owner
Chair Academic Board Salta Higher Education

profile_positions.description: Heading the education and research program of the Chair Group of Education and Competence Studies. The education program consists of skills oriented academic training for all students of Wageningen University, the minor education, and thematic courses. The research is aimed at the idenfication of key competencies, the development of competence, and the evaluation of the effectiveness of competence-based learning arrangements. This includes around 20 PhD projects.
profile_positions.title: Professor and Head of the Chair Group of Education and Competence Studies

volunteer_experiences.description: Acting as a member of editorial committees of journals and peer reviewing manuscripts is  voluntary job, although some publishers are beginning to pay for these services, which is understandable, since in the time of open access publishers want to sustain relationships with the professionals in their networks. I do not provide editorial and review services for money.
